attributes.action: Introduce Boot Camp for ASBO's and Criminal Damage
attributes.additional_details:
I would like a Boot Camp introduced as a minimum sentence for all ASBO, Criminal Damage and Anti-social behaviour.
All sentences to be like a National Service with a minimum of 2 years of Army style Boot Camp to instil respect and discipline.
This may have an effect that they wish to then become an integral part of society afterwards.
